attributes.action: Legalize cannabis for sale, consumption, and production
attributes.additional_details:
Changing the policy on cannabis can aid the country in the form of an additional tax source as is with tobacco products while also stopping an income source that the black market uses without paying their cut.
The policy change would also allow for the substance to be safer.

Alcohol specific -8,974 deaths in 2020 - Legal
Tobacco Specific -78,000 deaths in 2020 - Legal
Cannabis Specific -37 deaths in 2020 - Illegal

Let's follow the likes of America, Canada, Uruguay, Netherlands, and progress.
attributes.background: Legalize the production, consumption, and sale of cannabis and cannabis-related products to open a new market which could aid in creating more jobs that could assist in the current situation we are experiencing financially.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614503
